titleInfo.title: Ext 3331/45 'Resignation of W A C H Dobson from Secretariat of the Viceroy's Study Group'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 14; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains papers regarding the potential employment of Lieutenant-Colonel W A C H Dobson by the Foreign Office or War Office upon his return to London after serving in India in the Secretariat of the Viceroy’s Study Group. The primary correspondents are: Government of India; India Office.
